info.title: Open Data Hub PostgreSQL Api Tourism

parameters.name: pagenumber
parameters.description: Pagenumber, (default:1)

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: Elements per Page (If availabilitycheck set, pagesize has no effect all Accommodations are returned), (default:10)

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description: Seed '1 - 10' for Random Sorting, '0' generates a Random Seed, 'null' disables Random Sorting, (default:0)

parameters.name: categoryfilter
parameters.description: Categoryfilter (BITMASK values: 1 = (not categorized), 2 = (1star), 4 = (1flower), 8 = (1sun), 14 = (1star/1flower/1sun), 16 = (2stars), 32 = (2flowers), 64 = (2suns), 112 = (2stars/2flowers/2suns), 128 = (3stars), 256 = (3flowers), 512 = (3suns), 1024 = (3sstars), 1920 = (3stars/3flowers/3suns/3sstars), 2048 = (4stars), 4096 = (4flowers), 8192 = (4suns), 16384 = (4sstars), 30720 = (4stars/4flowers/4suns/4sstars), 32768 = (5stars), 65536 = (5flowers), 131072 = (5suns), 229376 = (5stars/5flowers/5suns), 'null' = No Filter), (default:'null')

parameters.name: typefilter
parameters.description: Typefilter (BITMASK values: 1 = (HotelPension), 2 = (BedBreakfast), 4 = (Farm), 8 = (Camping), 16 = (Youth), 32 = (Mountain), 64 = (Apartment), 'null' = No Filter), (default:'null')

parameters.name: boardfilter
parameters.description: Boardfilter (BITMASK values: 0 = (all boards), 1 = (without board), 2 = (breakfast), 4 = (half board), 8 = (full board), 16 = (All inclusive), 'null' = No Filter), (default:'0')

parameters.name: featurefilter
parameters.description: FeatureFilter (BITMASK values: 1 = (Ruhig gelegen), 2 = (Tagung), 4 = (Schwimmbad), 8 = (Sauna), 16 = (Garage), 32 = (Abholservice), 64 = (Wlan), 128 = (Barrierefrei), 256 = (Allergikerküche), 1024 = (Kleine Haustiere), 2048 = (Gruppenfreundlich), 'null' = No Filter), (default:'null')

parameters.name: themefilter
parameters.description: Themefilter (BITMASK values: 1 = (Gourment), 2 = (In der Höhe), 4 = (Regionale Wellness), 8 = (Biken), 16 = (Familie), 32 = (Wandern), 64 = (Wein), 128 = (Städtisches Flair), 256 = (Am Skigebiet), 512 = (Mediterran), 1024 = (Dolomiten), 2048 = (Alpin), 4096 = (Kleine Betriebe), 8192 = (Hütten und Berggasthöfe), 16384 = (Bäuerliche Welten), 'null' = No Filter), (default:'null')

parameters.name: badgefilter
parameters.description: BadgeFilter (BITMASK values: 1 = (Wellnesshotel), 2 = (Familienhotel), 4 = (Bikehotel), 8 = (Bauernhof), 16 = (Behindertengerecht), 32 = (Wanderhotel), 64 = (Südtirol Privatvermieter), 128 = (Vinum Hotels), 'null' = No Filter), (default:'null')

parameters.name: idfilter
parameters.description: IDFilter (Separator ',' List of Accommodation IDs, 'null' = No Filter), (default:'null')

parameters.name: locfilter
parameters.description: Locfilter (Separator ',' possible values: reg + REGIONID = (Filter by Region), reg + REGIONID = (Filter by Region), tvs + TOURISMVEREINID = (Filter by Tourismverein), mun + MUNICIPALITYID = (Filter by Municipality), fra + FRACTIONID = (Filter by Fraction), 'null' = No Filter), (default:'null')

parameters.name: odhtagfilter
parameters.description: ODHTag Filter (String, Separator ',' more ODHTags possible, 'null' = No Filter, available ODHTags reference to 'api/ODHTag?validforentity=accommodation'), (default:'null')

parameters.name: odhactive
parameters.description: ODHActive Filter (possible Values: 'null' Displays all Accommodations, 'true' only ODH Active Accommodations, 'false' only ODH Disabled Accommodations, (default:'null')

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: TIC Active Filter (possible Values: 'null' Displays all Accommodations, 'true' only TIC Active Accommodations, 'false' only TIC Disabled Accommodations, (default:'null')

parameters.name: arrival
parameters.description: Arrival Date (yyyy-MM-dd) REQUIRED, (default:'Today')

parameters.name: departure
parameters.description: Departure Date (yyyy-MM-dd) REQUIRED, (default:'Tomorrow')

parameters.name: roominfo
parameters.description: Roominfo Filter REQUIRED (Splitter for Rooms '|' Splitter for Persons Ages ',' possible Values Example 1-18,10|1-18 = 2 Rooms, Room 1 for 2 person Age 18 and Age 10, Room 2 for 1 Person Age 18), (default:'1-18,18')

parameters.name: bokfilter
parameters.description: Booking Channels Filter REQUIRED (Separator ',' possible values: hgv = (Booking Südtirol), htl = (Hotel.de), exp = (Expedia), bok = (Booking.com), lts = (LTS Availability check)), (default:'hgv')

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language of the Availability Response (possible values: 'de','it','en'), (default:'de')

parameters.name: availabilitycheck
parameters.description: Availability Check enabled/disabled (possible Values: 'true', 'false), (default Value: 'false')

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: GeoFilter Latitude Format: '46.624975', 'null' = disabled, (default:'null')

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: GeoFilter Longitude Format: '11.369909', 'null' = disabled, (default:'null')

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Radius to Search in Meters. Only Object withhin the given point and radius are returned and sorted by distance. Random Sorting is disabled if the GeoFilter Informations are provided, (default:'null')

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Accommodation

parameters.name: idsource
parameters.description: ID Source Filter (possible values:'lts','hgv'), (default:'lts')

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language of the Availability Response (possible values: 'de','it','en'), (default:'de')

parameters.description: Boardfilter (BITMASK values: 0 = (all boards), 1 = (without board), 2 = (breakfast), 4 = (half board), 8 = (full board), 16 = (All inclusive), 'null' = No Filter), (default:'0')

get.summary: GET Accommodation Changed List by Date

parameters.name: pagenumber
parameters.description: Pagenumber, (default:1)

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: Elements per Page (max 1024), (default:10)

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description: Seed '1 - 10' for Random Sorting, '0' generates a Random Seed, 'null' disables Random Sorting, (default:0)

parameters.name: updatefrom
parameters.description: Date from Format (yyyy-MM-dd) (all Accos with LastChange >= datefrom are passed), (default: DateTime.Now - 1 Day)

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: IF source = "lts" the Features list is returned in XML Format directly from LTS, (default: blank)

parameters.name: pagenumber
parameters.description: Pagenumber, (default:1)

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: Elements per Page (max 1024), (default:10)

parameters.name: activitytype
parameters.description: Type of the Activity (possible values: STRINGS: 'Berg','Radfahren','Stadtrundgang','Pferdesport','Wandern','Laufen und Fitness','Loipen','Rodelbahnen','Piste','Aufstiegsanlagen' - BITMASK also possible: 'Berg = 1','Radfahren = 2','Stadtrundgang = 4','Pferdesport = 8','Wandern = 16','Laufen und Fitness = 32','Loipen = 64','Rodelbahnen = 128,'Piste = 256,'Aufstiegsanlagen = 512), (default:'1023')

parameters.name: subtype
parameters.description: Subtype of the Activity (BITMASK Filter = available SubTypes depends on the selected Activity Type), (default:'null')

parameters.name: idlist
parameters.description: IDFilter (Separator ',' List of Activity IDs), (default:'null')

parameters.name: locfilter
parameters.description: Locfilter (Separator ',' possible values: reg + REGIONID = (Filter by Region), reg + REGIONID = (Filter by Region), tvs + TOURISMVEREINID = (Filter by Tourismverein), mun + MUNICIPALITYID = (Filter by Municipality), fra + FRACTIONID = (Filter by Fraction)), (default:'null')

parameters.name: areafilter
parameters.description: AreaFilter (Separator ',' IDList of AreaIDs separated by ','), (default:'null')

parameters.name: distancefilter
parameters.description: Distance Range Filter (Separator ',' example Value: 15,40 Distance from 15 up to 40 Km), (default:'null')

parameters.name: altitudefilter
parameters.description: Altitude Range Filter (Separator ',' example Value: 500,1000 Altitude from 500 up to 1000 metres), (default:'null')

parameters.name: durationfilter
parameters.description: Duration Range Filter (Separator ',' example Value: 1,3 Duration from 1 to 3 hours), (default:'null')

parameters.name: highlight
parameters.description: Hightlight Filter (possible values: 'false' = only Activities with Highlight false, 'true' = only Activities with Highlight true), (default:'null')

parameters.name: difficultyfilter
parameters.description: Difficulty Filter (possible values: '1' = easy, '2' = medium, '3' = difficult), (default:'null')

parameters.name: odhtagfilter
parameters.description: Taglist Filter (String, Separator ',' more Tags possible, available Tags reference to 'api/ODHTag?validforentity=activity'), (default:'null')

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Active Activities Filter (possible Values: 'true' only Active Activities, 'false' only Disabled Activities

parameters.name: odhactive
parameters.description: odhactive (Published) Activities Filter (possible Values: 'true' only published Activities, 'false' only not published Activities, (default:'null')

parameters.name: pagenumber
parameters.description: Pagenumber, (default:1)

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: Elements per Page (max 1024), (default:10)

parameters.name: poitype
parameters.description: Type of the Poi (possible values: STRINGS: 'Ärzte, Apotheken','Geschäfte','Kultur und Sehenswürdigkeiten','Nachtleben und Unterhaltung','Öffentliche Einrichtungen','Sport und Freizeit','Verkehr und Transport','Dienstleister','Kunsthandwerker' : BITMASK also possible: 'Ärzte, Apotheken = 1','Geschäfte = 2','Kultur und Sehenswürdigkeiten = 4','Nachtleben und Unterhaltung = 8','Öffentliche Einrichtungen = 16','Sport und Freizeit = 32','Verkehr und Transport = 64', 'Dienstleister' = 128, 'Kunsthandwerker' = 256), (default:'511')

parameters.name: subtype
parameters.description: Subtype of the Poi ('null' = Filter disabled, available Subtypes depends on the activitytype BITMASK), (default:'null')

parameters.name: idlist
parameters.description: IDFilter (Separator ',' List of Activity IDs, 'null' = No Filter), (default:'null')

parameters.name: locfilter
parameters.description: Locfilter (Separator ',' possible values: reg + REGIONID = (Filter by Region), reg + REGIONID = (Filter by Region), tvs + TOURISMVEREINID = (Filter by Tourismverein), mun + MUNICIPALITYID = (Filter by Municipality), fra + FRACTIONID = (Filter by Fraction), 'null' = No Filter), (default:'null')

parameters.name: areafilter
parameters.description: AreaFilter (Separator ',' IDList of AreaIDs separated by ',', 'null' : Filter disabled), (default:'null')

parameters.name: highlight
parameters.description: Highlight Filter (Show only Highlights possible values: 'true' : show only Highlight Pois, 'null' Filter disabled), (default:'null')

parameters.name: odhtagfilter
parameters.description: Taglist Filter (String, Separator ',' more Tags possible, available Tags reference to 'api/SmgTag/ByMainEntity/Activity'), (default:'null'), (default:'null')

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Active Activities Filter (possible Values: 'true' only Active Activities, 'false' only Disabled Activities, (default:'null')

parameters.name: odhactive
parameters.description: odhactive (Published) Activities Filter (possible Values: 'true' only published Activities, 'false' only not published Activities, (default:'null'), (default:'null')

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description: Seed '1 - 10' for Random Sorting, '0' generates a Random Seed, not provided disables Random Sorting, (default:'0')

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: GeoFilter Latitude Format: '46.624975', 'null' = disabled, (default:'null')

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: GeoFilter Longitude Format: '11.369909', 'null' = disabled, (default:'null')

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Radius to Search in Meters. Only Object withhin the given point and radius are returned and sorted by distance. Random Sorting is disabled if the GeoFilter Informations are provided, (default:'null')
